Text: I've been having lots of BSOD lately and diagnosis points the problem towards Hard Disk.  I hope i'm in that lucky 60% and this program fixes the random crash.  I'll let you know if it does, thank you for such upload.
I only got it to work after disconnecting the internet, running a registry cleaner, and then installing this. Maybe it's because I previously had a trial version I uninstalled.
Really good job, works like a charm. Thanx !!!
